articles.title: Maui deadly fires could happen again in many US cities and towns - USA TODAY
articles.description: Maui disaster shows America's high risk for devastation from wildfires as communities lack plans, cash to keep citizens safe from blazes.
articles.content: The deadly wildfires in Maui reveal a vulnerability in the United States that is increasing as quickly as threats from climate change: Huge swaths of the nation lie in dry danger zones where wildfire… [+9460 chars]
